citation: Proclamation under the Asbestos-Related Diseases (Occupational Exposure) Compensation Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Asbestos-Related Diseases (Occupational Exposure) Compensation Act 2011

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Asbestos-Related Diseases (Occupational Exposure) Compensation Act 2011 fix 31 October 2011 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

17 October 2011

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Workplace Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 October 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
